channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WPaudio MP3 Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WPaudio MP3 Player

item.title: CVE-2023-0069|2024-08-02T04:54:32.574Z -- unknown -- wpaudio%20mp3%20player
item.description: The WPaudio MP3 Player WordPress plugin through 4.0.2 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
